headline: Ask HN: Why are there so few “artificial sunlight”/“artificial window” products?
description:
The demand for "natural light" in homes and offices is very high, and higher than the availability of actual daylight. And there seems to be a pretty feasible way to create a fake window (a light panel that mimics sunlight through a window), using LEDs and a fresnel lens. There's no shortage of videos around showing how to DIY such a thing, such as https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8JrqH2oOTK4 and https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GDeEuzKXCH4

So, why can't I find many such products for sale? There are a couple of high-end companies like https://www.coelux.com/, but where's the mass market stuff? Is there an opportunity being overlooked here, or am I just missing something?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 为什么 "人造阳光"/"人造窗户 "产品这么少？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 為什麼 "人造陽光"/"人造窗戶 "產品這麼少？
description_zh-Hans:
家庭和办公室对"自然光"的需求非常高，而且高于实际日光的可用性。而且似乎有一个相当可行的方法，使用LED和菲涅尔透镜来创造一个假窗（一个模仿阳光透过窗户的光板）。周围不乏展示如何DIY这种东西的视频，如https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8JrqH2oOTK4 和https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GDeEuzKXCH4

那么，为什么我找不到很多这种产品的销售呢？有几家高端公司，如https://www.coelux.com/，但大众市场的产品在哪里？这里是否有一个被忽视的机会，或者我只是错过了什么？
description_zh-Hant:
家庭和辦公室對"自然光"的需求非常高，而且高於實際日光的可用性。而且似乎有一個相當可行的方法，使用LED和菲涅爾透鏡來創造一個假窗（一個模仿陽光透過窗戶的光板）。周圍不乏展示如何DIY這種東西的視頻，如https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8JrqH2oOTK4 和https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GDeEuzKXCH4

那麼，為什麼我找不到很多這種產品的銷售呢？有幾家高端公司，如https://www.coelux.com/，但大眾市場的產品在哪裡？這裡是否有一個被忽視的機會，或者我只是錯過了什麼？
